src:
Matjaž Kek: Usoden je bil popoln mrk v Skopju
Selektor slovenske nogometne reprezentance za tekmi z Latvijo in s Poljsko napovedal nekaj novih imen. Če osvojiš eno točko od šestih v dveh tekmah z Makedonci, ne moreš računati na nastop na euru.
04 Nov 2019, 12:45 by Jernej Suhadolnik



Matjaž Kek bo jutri opoldne razkril imena fantov, s katerimi bo napadel Latvijo in Poljsko. FOTO: Tomi Lombar



»Drži, novembra bom poskušal preveriti nekaj novih imen,« je zatrdil Matjaž Kek. FOTO: Roman Šipić


LJUBLJANA – Razplet oktobrskih tekem slovenske nogometne reprezentance v Skopju in Stožicah proti Severni Makedoniji in Avstriji ni razžalostil le navijačev in nogometne zveze, marveč tudi selektorja Matjaža Keka. Mariborčan se bo jutri na Brdu ozrl v zadnji tekmi boja za euro 2020, na Gorenjskem bo razkril imena fantov, s katerimi bo poskušal opraviti čim več v dvobojih z Latvijo v Ljubljani (16. 11.) in tri dni pozneje s Poljsko v Varšavi.


»Drži, novembra bom poskušal preveriti nekaj novih imen,« je zatrdil Matjaž Kek. FOTO: Roman Šipić

»Domen Črnigoj je zavoljo ponavljajočih se poškodb že odpadel s seznama, tik pred zdajci se bom odločil o (ne)udeležbi prav tako načetih oziroma poškodovanih Reneja Krhina in Romana Bezjaka,« je sporočil selektor Kek in napovedal dodatne spremembe v primerjavi z oktobrsko akcijo. Slab mesec po porazih s Severno Makedonijo in Avstrijo smo ga ujeli sredi delovnika. Če večina smrtnikov konec tedna polni svoje baterije pred novimi izzivi, je usoda slehernega selektorja na svetu obratna, sobota in nedelja sta zanje napornejša od maratona v New Yorku.Tudi Kek si prek TV ogleda večino tekem svojih legionarjev po Evropi in ZDA. Kakšen je torej trenutni položaj fantov? »Namesto čestitk za dosežene gole prejemajo rdeče kartone,« je Kek na pol za šalo, na pol zares izpostavil izključitvi igralca moštva CSKA Jake Bijola na derbiju ruskega prvenstva v St. Peterburgu in Josipa Iličića v opoldanski tekmi serie A med Atalanto in Cagliarijem.V seštevku je učinek njegovih adutov v tujini podoben kot septembra ali oktobra – po programu, zato med delovno akcijo na Obali ne bi smelo biti presenečenj v pripravi na tekmi z Latvijo, ki jo vodi nekdanji slovenski selektor Slaviša Stojanović, in Poljsko, ki si je kljub porazu v Stožicah zagotovila nastop na evropskem prvenstvu leta 2020.»Poskušal bom preveriti nekaj novih imen, če lahko rečem tako. V ospredju imam vendarle jasen načrt, po katerem želim končati ciklus karseda uspešno v kontekstu osvajanja točk. Gre za točke, tekme, ki štejejo in vplivajo na naš jakostni količnik, zato bi bilo brezglavo in preuranjeno eksperimentiranje povsem neprimerno,« je Mariborčan potrdil, da želi izboljšati položaj Slovenije na lestvici skupine G (Poljska 19, Avstrija 16, S. Makedonija, Slovenija in Izrael po 11, Latvija 0). 
Manjka vrlina stalnosti zmag
O morebitnem čudežu ne razmišlja, torej o neverjetnem scenariju, po katerem si lahko Slovenija priigra nastop na euru 2020. To bi se zgodilo v primeru porazov Avstrije z Makedonci na Dunaju in z Latvijo v Rigi, domačega neuspeha Makedoncev z Izraelci in – seveda – v primeru šestih slovenskih točk v Stožicah in Varšavi.»Ah, oktober je sporočil, da se moramo Slovenci ukvarjati zgolj s samim seboj, ne pa z drugimi! Septembra in oktobra sem videl obe plati te izbrane vrste. Kontinuiteta zmag je vrlina ekip, ki si bodo priigrale nastop na EP, mi tega žal (še) nimamo. Za nas je bil usoden popoln mrk v Skopju. Prav zavoljo tega bomo tokrat še bolj razmišljali o svojih odlikah in slabostih,« je napovedal Kek. Kako torej doseči psihološko stanje reprezentantov, da bodo pripravljeni na boj za točke – za značajsko držo, s katero so zmleli Poljake in Izraelce, mesec dni zatem pa poleteli v nebo in nato pristali na trdnih tleh na gostovanju v Skopju?Namesto na Brdo v KoperČlanska reprezentanca bo zamenjala svoje pripravljalno središče in tradicionalno bazo na Gorenjskem za koprsko Bonifiko. »Tam bomo imeli na voljo odlične razmere za trening in ustrezno pripravo,« je zatrdil selektor Matjaž Kek, ki bo jato zbral v ponedeljek na Obali. Novembrske noči so tudi s pomočjo premikanja ure daljše od oktobrskih, zato bo reprezentanca kovala načrt za tekmi z Latvijo v Stožicah in s Poljsko v Varšavi tudi s pomočjo umetne razsvetljave. To na Brdu seveda ne bi bilo mogoče.»Imate prav. V Makedoniji smo zašli v težave, saj ne psihološko ne izvedbeno nismo bili na ustrezni ravni, posledično nismo bili sposobni niti zasukati rezultata po golu Makedoncev. Morda smo se po dveh dobrih tekmah že videli na euru. Morda gre pri tem za značajski dejavnik. Toda, pozor, če osvojiš eno točko od šestih v dveh tekmah z Makedonci, seveda ne moreš računati na nastop na evropskem prvenstvu,« je ocenil mesec dni od neuspešne bitke za Skopje.Avstrija je sledila tri dni pozneje, Slovenci pa so še drugič zapovrstjo izgubili – delno po lastni zaslugi, delno po zaslugi škandaloznega sojenja sicer uglednega turškega sodnika Cüneyta Čakirja (nedosojena 11-m za Slovenijo in rdeči karton za Avstrijo) pred očmi svojega šefa Vlada Šajna in predsednika Uefe Aleksandra Čeferina. »Lahko bi izpostavil tudi sodnika. Kdo ve, kako bi se končala tekma, če bi Čakir v 30. minuti dosodil kaj drugega.
točk je v osmih tekmah kvalifikacij za euro osvojila Slovenija.
Toda v seštevku raje ostanem samokritičen: če ne bi septembra videl v očeh in nogah fantov, da je mogoče opraviti veliko tudi v tekmah z najboljšimi, bi si priznal nekaj v slogu 'kaj hočemo, takšni pač smo'. Zato vem, da bi oktobra morali pokazati več,« je zatrdil Kek in dodal: »Tako za člansko ekipo Slovenije kot njeno selekcijo U-15 bo vedno veljalo enako: temeljna stvar, o kateri sploh ne bi smeli govoriti in bi morala biti samoumevna, je iti na glavo, kot radi rečemo. Tako je bilo pred dvajsetimi in desetimi leti, nič drugače ni danes.«
text:
Matjaz Kek: The total eclipse in Skopje was fatal
The coach of the Slovenian national football team announced some new names for the matches with Latvia and Poland. If you score one point out of six in two matches with the Macedonians, you cannot count on the Euro.
04 Nov 2019, 12:45 by Jernej Suhadolnik



Tomorrow at noon, Matjaz Kek will reveal the names of the boys he will use to attack Latvia and Poland. PHOTO: Tommy Lombar



"Yes, I'll try to check some new names in November," Matjaz Kek said. PHOTO: Roman Sipic


LJUBLJANA - The October matches of the Slovenian national football team in Skopje and Stozice against North Macedonia and Austria not only saddened the fans and the football association, but also coach Matjaz Kek. Tomorrow, Maribor will look at Brdo in the last match for the Euro 2020 fight, in Gorenjska it will reveal the names of the boys it will try to play as much as possible in duels with Latvia in Ljubljana (November 16) and three days later with Poland in Warsaw.


"Yes, I'll try to check some new names in November," Matjaz Kek said. PHOTO: Roman Sipic

"Due to repeated injuries, Domen Crnigoj has already been removed from the list, so soon I will decide on the (un) participation of the injured or injured Rene Krkhin and Roman Bezjak as well," announced Kek, announcing additional changes compared to the October campaign. It was not a month after the defeats with Northern Macedonia and Austria that he was caught in the middle of a working day. If most mortals are recharging their batteries on weekends in the face of new challenges, the fate of every selector in the world is the opposite, Saturday and Sunday are more strenuous than the New York marathon. So what is the current situation of the boys? "Instead of congratulations on goals scored, they receive red cards," Kek half-jokingly exposed CSKA player Jake Bijola's exclusion in the Russian Championship derby in St. Petersburg. Petersburg and Josip Ilicic in the Serie A midday match between Atalanta and Cagliari.In sum, the effect of his trump cards abroad is similar to September or October - according to the program, so there should be no surprises during the working campaign on the Coast in preparation for the match with Latvia, which it is led by former Slovenian coach Slavisa Stojanovic, and Poland, which, despite defeating Stozice, secured her appearance at the European Championships in 2020. "I will try to check some new names, if I may say so. In the foreground, however, I have a clear plan to end the cycle as successfully as possible in the context of winning points. These are points, matches that count and influence our strength factor, so a headless and premature experimentation would be completely inappropriate, "Maribor confirmed that he wants to improve Slovenia's position on the Group G rankings (Poland 19, Austria 16, S. Macedonia, Slovenia and Israel 11 each, Latvia 0).
The virtue of the permanence of victories is lacking
He does not think of a possible miracle, that is, an incredible scenario in which Slovenia can win the Euro 2020 show. This would happen in the case of Austria's defeat with the Macedonians in Vienna and Latvia in Riga, the Macedonian's domestic failure with the Israelis and - of course - in the case of six Slovenian points in Stožice and Warsaw. »Ah, October announced that Slovenes should deal only with themselves, not with others! In September and October, I saw both sides of this chosen species. Continuity of wins is a virtue of the teams that will win the EP, unfortunately we do not have that yet. For us, the total eclipse in Skopje was fatal. It is for this reason that we will think even more about our strengths and weaknesses, "Kek announced. So how do you get the psychological status of the teams to be ready to fight for the points - for the character posture that grinded the Poles and Israelis, then flew to the sky a month later and then landed on solid ground while visiting Skopje? the national team will replace its training center and traditional base in Gorenjska for Bonifika in Koper. "We will have excellent training and preparation facilities there," said coach Matjaž Kek, who will gather on Monday at the Coast. November's nights are also longer than October's by moving the clock, so the national team will forge a match plan with Latvia in Stozice and Poland in Warsaw with artificial lighting. Of course, that would not be possible in Brdo. ”You are right. In Macedonia, we got into trouble because we were not psychologically or practically not at the proper level, and consequently we were not able to even twist the result after the goal of the Macedonians. We may have already seen you after the two good games on the euro. This may be a factor. But, beware, if you score one point out of six in two games with the Macedonians, you cannot count on getting to the European Championships, of course, "he estimated a month after the unsuccessful battle for Skopje. Austria followed three days later, with the Slovenes second in succession. lost - partly on their own merit, partly on account of the scandalous trial of the otherwise renowned Turkish judge Cüneyt Cakir (undisputed 11th for Slovenia and red card for Austria) before the eyes of his boss Vlad Shain and Uefa President Alexander Ceferin. “I could also expose the judge. Who knows how the match would have ended if Chakir had done something else in the 30th minute.
Slovenia won eight points in eight qualifying matches for the Euro.
But in the aggregate, I prefer to remain self-critical: if I didn't see in the eyes and feet of guys in September that a lot can be done in matches with the best, I would admit to something like 'what do we want, that's what we are'. That's why I know we should show more in October, "Kek said, adding:" Both the Slovenian team and its U-15 selection will always be the same: a fundamental thing that should not be talked about at all and should be taken for granted, is to go upside down, as we like to say. That was 20 and 10 years ago, it's no different today. "
